section.name: ordering_attributes
section.title: Ordering Attributes
section.help: Samples or samples regions will be ordered according to the values of the given attribute(s). A a new ordering metadata and/or region attribute is added with the sample or region ordering value, respectively.

section.help: It is possible to specify the number (or percentage) of samples (or regions) to be extracted from the ordered dataset (or from each sample), starting from the top (with respect to the ascending/descending ordering).
